# Function

The the superior, middle, and inferior G-H ligaments reinforce the anterior portion of the outer fibers of the [Glenohumeral Joint Capsule]({{< var ref-glenohumeral-joint.capsule >}}) @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
